verses.verse: The proverbs <S%H4912><s%> of Solomon <S%H8010><s%>. A wise <S%H2450><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> maketh a glad <S%H8055><s%> father <S%H1><s%>: but a foolish <S%H3684><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> is the heaviness <S%H8424><s%> of his mother <S%H517><s%>.
Treasures <S%H214><s%> of wickedness <S%H7562><s%> profit <S%H3276><s%> nothing: but righteousness <S%H6666><s%> delivereth <S%H5337><s%> from death <S%H4194><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> will not suffer <S%H7456><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> to famish <S%H7456><s%>: but he casteth away <S%H1920><s%> the substance <S%H1942><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>. the substance: or, the wicked for their wickedness
He becometh poor <S%H7326><s%> that dealeth <S%H6213><s%> with a slack <S%H7423><s%> hand <S%H3709><s%>: but the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the diligent <S%H2742><s%> maketh rich <S%H6238><s%>.

He that gathereth <S%H103><s%> in summer <S%H7019><s%> is a wise <S%H7919><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>: but he that sleepeth <S%H7290><s%> in harvest <S%H7105><s%> is a son <S%H1121><s%> that causeth shame <S%H954><s%>.
Blessings <S%H1293><s%> are upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the just <S%H6662><s%>: but violence <S%H2555><s%> covereth <S%H3680><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.
The memory <S%H2143><s%> of the just <S%H6662><s%> is blessed <S%H1293><s%>: but the name <S%H8034><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall rot <S%H7537><s%>.

The wise <S%H2450><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> will receive <S%H3947><s%> commandments <S%H4687><s%>: but a prating <S%H8193><s%> fool <S%H191><s%> shall fall <S%H3832><s%>. a prating: Heb. a fool of lips fall: Heb. be beaten
He that walketh <S%H3212><s%> uprightly <S%H8537><s%> walketh <S%H1980><s%> surely <S%H983><s%>: but he that perverteth <S%H6140><s%> his ways <S%H1870><s%> shall be known <S%H3045><s%>.
He that winketh <S%H7169><s%> with the eye <S%H5869><s%> causeth <S%H5414><s%> sorrow <S%H6094><s%>: but a prating <S%H8193><s%> fool <S%H191><s%> shall fall <S%H3832><s%>. fall: Heb. be beaten

The mouth <S%H6310><s%> of a righteous <S%H6662><s%> man is a well <S%H4726><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>: but violence <S%H2555><s%> covereth <S%H3680><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.
Hatred <S%H8135><s%> stirreth up <S%H5782><s%> strifes <S%H4090><s%>: but love <S%H160><s%> covereth <S%H3680><s%> all sins <S%H6588><s%>.

In the lips <S%H8193><s%> of him that hath understanding <S%H995><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is found <S%H4672><s%>: but a rod <S%H7626><s%> is for the back <S%H1460><s%> of him that is void <S%H2638><s%> of understanding <S%H3820><s%>. of understanding: Heb. of heart
Wise <S%H2450><s%> men lay up <S%H6845><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>: but the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the foolish <S%H191><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> destruction <S%H4288><s%>.
The rich man's <S%H6223><s%> wealth <S%H1952><s%> is his strong <S%H5797><s%> city <S%H7151><s%>: the destruction <S%H4288><s%> of the poor <S%H1800><s%> is their poverty <S%H7389><s%>.
The labour <S%H6468><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> tendeth to life <S%H2416><s%>: the fruit <S%H8393><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> to sin <S%H2403><s%>.

He is in the way <S%H734><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%> that keepeth <S%H8104><s%> instruction <S%H4148><s%>: but he that refuseth <S%H5800><s%> reproof <S%H8433><s%> erreth <S%H8582><s%>. erreth: or, causeth to err
He that hideth <S%H3680><s%> hatred <S%H8135><s%> with lying <S%H8267><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%>, and he that uttereth <S%H3318><s%> a slander <S%H1681><s%>, is a fool <S%H3684><s%>.
In the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of words <S%H1697><s%> there wanteth <S%H2308><s%> not sin <S%H6588><s%>: but he that refraineth <S%H2820><s%> his lips <S%H8193><s%> is wise <S%H7919><s%>.
The tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the just <S%H6662><s%> is as choice <S%H977><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%>: the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is little worth <S%H4592><s%>.

The lips <S%H8193><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> many <S%H7227><s%>: but fools <S%H191><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> for want <S%H2638><s%> of wisdom <S%H3820><s%>. of wisdom: Heb. of heart
The blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, it maketh rich <S%H6238><s%>, and he addeth <S%H3254><s%> no sorrow <S%H6089><s%> with it.
It is as sport <S%H7814><s%> to a fool <S%H3684><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> mischief <S%H2154><s%>: but a man <S%H376><s%> of understanding <S%H8394><s%> hath wisdom <S%H2451><s%>.
The fear <S%H4034><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, it shall come <S%H935><s%> upon him: but the desire <S%H8378><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be granted <S%H5414><s%>.
As the whirlwind <S%H5492><s%> passeth <S%H5674><s%>, so is the wicked <S%H7563><s%> no more: but the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> foundation <S%H3247><s%>.
As vinegar <S%H2558><s%> to the teeth <S%H8127><s%>, and as smoke <S%H6227><s%> to the eyes <S%H5869><s%>, so is the sluggard <S%H6102><s%> to them that send <S%H7971><s%> him.

The fear <S%H3374><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> prolongeth <S%H3254><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>: but the years <S%H8141><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be shortened <S%H7114><s%>. prolongeth: Heb. addeth
The hope <S%H8431><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be gladness <S%H8057><s%>: but the expectation <S%H8615><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%>.
The way <S%H1870><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is strength <S%H4581><s%> to the upright <S%H8537><s%>: but destruction <S%H4288><s%> shall be to the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%>.
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall never <S%H5769><s%> be removed <S%H4131><s%>: but the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall not inhabit <S%H7931><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>.
The mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the just <S%H6662><s%> bringeth forth <S%H5107><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>: but the froward <S%H8419><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> shall be cut out <S%H3772><s%>.

The lips <S%H8193><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> what is acceptable <S%H7522><s%>: but the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> speaketh frowardness <S%H8419><s%>. frowardness: Heb. frowardnesses
